subject: Defective item received in my order
description: I recently purchased a wireless keyboard from your store, but one of the keys keeps getting stuck. I’ve tried resetting it and even replacing the batteries, but the issue persists. Can you help me with a replacement or a solution?
template_text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We’re sorry about the inconvenience and will assist you with the replacement process. Please provide your order number, and we’ll get this sorted out for you.

subject: Defective product received in the package
description: I recently placed an order and received the item today. Unfortunately, it appears to be defective as it doesn't function as advertised. I would like to know the process for getting a replacement or refund.
template_text: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide photos of the defective product, and we'll assist you with a replacement or refund promptly.

subject: Request for Refund on Defective Item
description: I received an item last week and it doesn't work as described. I've tried reaching out previously but haven't gotten a resolution. I'd like to get a refund as soon as possible.
template_text: Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear about this issue with your item. We’ve forwarded your request to our returns team who will get back to you within 48 hours.

subject: Double charge on my credit card
description: I noticed that my credit card has been charged twice for my last order. Could you please help me resolve this? I need this fixed as soon as possible.
template_text: Thank you for reaching out. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We are looking into this issue and will get back to you shortly with a resolution.

subject: Received damaged product in shipment
description: I just received my order today, but the product is damaged. The outer packaging was fine, but the item inside is broken. I need a replacement or a refund as soon as possible.
template_text: Thank you for reaching out! We're sorry to hear about the damaged product. Please provide a picture of the damaged item so we can assist you with a replacement or refund promptly.

subject: Defective product received in recent order
description: I just received my order yesterday, but one of the items is defective. The screen has a crack, and it doesn't turn on at all. Can you let me know how to proceed with a replacement or refund?
template_text: We're sorry to hear about the defective item. Please provide us with your order number and a photo of the damaged product so we can assist you with a replacement or refund promptly.

subject: Double charge on my credit card
description: I noticed that I was charged twice for the same purchase on my credit card statement. Can you please look into this and help me resolve the issue? I need the extra charge refunded as soon as possible.
template_text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. I’ve escalated this to our billing team for further review and will update you as soon as we have more information. Please allow 1–2 business days for us to investigate.

subject: Error message when opening the app
description: Hi, I keep getting an 'Error 503: Server Unavailable' message every time I try to open the app on my phone. I’ve tried restarting my device and reinstalling the app, but the issue persists. Can you help me fix this?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out! We’re sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please confirm the version of the app you’re using and your device model so we can investigate further?

template_text: Thanks for contacting us about your product issues issue. We’ll look into it.

subject: Defective item received in recent order

subject: Request for refund on damaged item

subject: Defective product received in the mail
description: I ordered a vacuum cleaner from your website last week and it arrived yesterday. However, it doesn't turn on when plugged in, and the power button seems to be stuck. Can I get a replacement or a repair for this?

subject: Unable to update email address on account

subject: Package not delivered by estimated date

template_text: Thank you for reaching out. I’ve checked your tracking information and it appears the package is delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. I’ll follow up with the carrier and provide you with an update as soon as possible.

subject: Package not delivered on time
description: I was expecting my package to arrive yesterday based on the shipping details provided during checkout. However, it still hasn't arrived, and the tracking information hasn't updated for two days. Can you please help me understand the delay and provide an update?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out! I’ve contacted the shipping partner to investigate the delay and will provide you with an update as soon as I receive more information. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

subject: Request for refund on damaged item
description: I received my order yesterday, but the item was damaged when I opened the package. I would like to request a refund or replacement for the product. Can you please assist me with the process?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out. We’re sorry to hear about the damaged item. Can you please provide photos of the damage and your order number so we can assist you further?

subject: Request for refund on defective item
description: I recently purchased a coffee maker from your store, but it stopped working after just two days. I'd like to know how to return it and get a refund. Please advise on the next steps.
template_text: Thank you for contacting us. We’re sorry to hear about the issue with your coffee maker. I’ve forwarded this to our returns team, and they will provide you with a prepaid return label and refund instructions shortly.

subject: Incorrect charge on my billing statement
description: I noticed an extra charge on my credit card that I don’t recognize. It’s dated October 15th and doesn’t match any purchase I made. Could you please clarify what this is for?
template_text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will review your billing history and get back to you with more details shortly.

subject: Unable to connect to Wi-Fi network
description: I recently purchased one of your routers and I'm having trouble connecting to my Wi-Fi network. I've followed the setup guide, but it still doesn't work. Can you help me resolve this issue?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out! Please ensure that the router's firmware is up to date and check if the network name and password are entered correctly. Let us know if you still face issues.

subject: Charged twice for my subscription
description: I just noticed on my credit card statement that I was charged twice for this month’s subscription. Can you please check and issue a refund for the duplicate charge? I rely on your service and hope this can be resolved quickly.
template_text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We’ve reviewed your account and confirmed the duplicate charge, and I’ve issued a refund. You should see it reflected on your account within 3–5 business days. Please let us know if you need further assistance!

subject: Request for information on product warranty
description: Hi, I recently purchased one of your products and wanted to know more about the warranty coverage details. Could you please provide information on what is included and the duration of the warranty?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out! I'll be happy to provide the details regarding your product's warranty. Could you share the product model or order number so I can assist you better?

subject: Unable to connect to Wi-Fi network
description: I recently purchased your router, and I'm having trouble connecting it to my Wi-Fi network. I've followed the setup guide, but the device keeps showing an error saying 'Cannot establish connection'. Can someone assist me with troubleshooting this issue?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out. Please try restarting the router and ensuring the network credentials are entered correctly. Let us know if the issue persists so we can assist further.

subject: Incorrect charge on my last invoice
description: I just received my invoice for this month, and I noticed an extra charge that I don’t recognize. I believe it might be a mistake. Can you please review my account and clarify this for me?
template_text: Thank you for reaching out. I’ve forwarded your inquiry to our billing team who will review the charge and get back to you shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

subject: Inquiry about new product features

subject: Unable to connect to Wi-Fi network

subject: Unable to connect to Wi-Fi network
